title: Pipeline Petroleum Movement
notes:
Pipeline movement is the sum of all crude oil and petroleum products moved between Petroleum Administration for Defense Districts (PADDs): PADD 1 to 2, PADD 1 to 3, PADD 2 to 1, PADD 2 to 3, PADD 2 to 4; PADD 3 to 1, PADD 3 to 2, PADD 3 to 4, PADD 3 to 5, PADD 4 to 2, PADD 4 to 3, PADD 4 to 5, PADD 5 to 3, and PADD 5 to 4 (from EIA Petroleum Supply Monthly, table 58) and crude oil production in Alaska (from EIA Crude Oil Production available here (https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_crd_crpdn_adc_mbbl_m.htm).

This data is collected by the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) available here (http://www.eia.gov/petroleum/supply/monthly/) for Table 58 and available here (https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_crd_crpdn_adc_mbbl_m.htm) for Alaska.
